Package com.jimmyselectronics.virgilio

Interface ElectronicScaleListener

All Superinterfaces:
AbstractDeviceListener
public interface ElectronicScaleListener extends AbstractDeviceListener
Listens for events emanating from an electronic scale.
Author:
Jimmy's Electronics LLP

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    outOfOverload(ElectronicScale scale)
    Announces that the former excessive weight has been removed from the indicated scale, and it is again able to measure weight.
    void
    overload(ElectronicScale scale)
    Announces that excessive weight has been placed on the indicated scale.
    void
    weightChanged(ElectronicScale scale, double weightInGrams)
    Announces that the weight on the indicated scale has changed.

    Methods inherited from interface com.jimmyselectronics.AbstractDeviceListener

    disabled, enabled, turnedOff, turnedOn

  • Method Details

    • weightChanged

      void weightChanged(ElectronicScale scale, double weightInGrams)
      Announces that the weight on the indicated scale has changed.
      Parameters:
      scale - The scale where the event occurred.
      weightInGrams - The new weight.

    • overload

      void overload(ElectronicScale scale)
      Announces that excessive weight has been placed on the indicated scale.
      Parameters:
      scale - The scale where the event occurred.

    • outOfOverload

      void outOfOverload(ElectronicScale scale)
      Announces that the former excessive weight has been removed from the indicated scale, and it is again able to measure weight.
      Parameters:
      scale - The scale where the event occurred.
